body.name: Saiyin Sound Bars for TV, 40 Watts Small Soundbar for TV,Surround Sound System TV Sound Bar Speakers with Bluetooth/Optical/AUX Connection for PC/Gaming/Projectors,17inch
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 14 hrs 6 mins
features: 【Ultra-Compact Design】The 17-inch soundbar is a compact and sleek audio device that great for desktop space especially small to medium-sized living room or bedroom.Our sound bar takes up less space and is effortlessly moveable, making it an ideal TV speakers sound bar!

【Loud and Clear】 This soundbar is built with 2 full-range speakers that provide a more realistic, spatial audio experience to make movies and music truly come to life, allowing you to enjoy all details of music and movies.

【Multiple Input Connections】 Our small sound bar has various connectivity options, including Bluetooth, optical,and auxiliary input, which allows you to connect it to your TV, smartphone, PC ,tablet, or other devices to stream music or watch movies. Besides, the home audio sound bars has a "SUB OUT" port, which supports the connection of an active subwoofer.(Press the M button on soundbar can switch the three connection modes of Optical /AUX/ Bluetooth)

【Optimize Entertainment With Different Sound Modes】The sound bar can be switched to three equalizer modes (Music, Movie, News) with remote. This soundbar not only produces clear and detailed sound regardless of the content you're watching or listening to, but also enhances the dialogues, bass and treble of music, movies, and TV shows,and makes them sound more realistic and engaging.（Remote control is not compatible with universal or TV remotes ）

【Set Up In Minutes】You can put the soundbar on desktop or mounted on the wall directly with rovided wall mounting kits. The TV soundbars size is: 17" * 3.5" * 2.5". What’s inside: soundbar, remote control, wall mounting kit, optical cable, 3.5 to 3.5mm audio cable, Power adapter and user manual.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: DSP & 3 Customized Sounds: The soundbar for TV is built-in DSP technology, provide 3 different sound effect modes (Movie, Music, Dialog)!

Remote and Button Control There are two ways to control the soundbar. Remote control allows you controlling the soundbar while sitting on the sofa which is very convenient. Aim the sensor when using remote. Remote distance is effective within 5M.Remote control is not compatible with universal or TV remotes (Batteries not included) . Fits Multiple TV Sizes This soundbar is most suitable for screen sizes of 42 inches and under,perfect for small living rooms. LED Indicator Light Different colors of the indicator light shows different the mode of the soundbar,so you can quickly switch between different modes. AUX (Green LED)Bluetooth (Blue LED)Optical (Purple LED)Standby (Red LED)

User Tips For Optical(SPDIF)connection,please change your TV audio output to optical, and change the audio format setting to PCM and make sure the protective caps at the ends of the optical cable are removed before plugging it in.Sound bars for TV does not support Dolby Sound and DTS, please kindly disable Dolby and DTS on your TV, Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, HBO, Hulu, Youtube, and other streaming video apps.Soundbar does not have USB interface, the soundbar can be connected to your computer through the AUX interface. The AUX port cannot be used as a headphone jack.

User Tips For Optical(SPDIF)connection,please change your TV audio output to optical, and change the audio format setting to PCM and make sure the protective caps at the ends of the optical cable are removed before plugging it in.Sound bars for TV does not support Dolby Sound and DTS, please kindly disable Dolby and DTS on your TV, Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, HBO, Hulu, Youtube, and other streaming video apps.Soundbar does not have USB interface, the soundbar can be connected to your computer through the AUX interface. The AUX port cannot be used as a headphone jack.

Frequently Asked Questions Q: When I use APPs such as Netflix on the TV, the soundbar has no sound. A: The soundbar does not support Dolby and DTS, please kindly disable the Dolby and DTS on your TV audio settings or streaming video APPs like Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, HBO, Hulu, Youtube. Q: How to quickly disconnect the current Bluetooth device connected with Soundbar? A: Press and hold the BT button on remote /M button on soundbar for about 2 seconds to disconnect the current Bluetooth device. Q: My dog chewed my remote, how do l get a replacement remote? A: We provide free replacement soundbar accessories, including remotes. Please do not hesitate to reach out to us. Q: How do I use TV remote to control the soundbar? A: The IR code of the remote control is not compatible with universal remotes and TV remotes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gets LOUD (I got a replacement due to a dud subwoofer free of charge) 5 STARS
reviews.reviewText: **UPDATE**The company Saiyan saw my review and almost immediately enquired about the issue to resolve it. Their representative was very quick and professional. Due to the issue with my subwoofer they sent an entirely new system (soundbar and subwoofer) free of charge and without me needing to return the old one. In this case the subwoofer is working perfectly without any knocking noise like the previous one. They also redesigned the subwoofer enclosure/box so its slightly bigger in all dimensions and subwoofer sits slightly closer to the front. This change seems to work greatly as the subwoofer audibly is louder and hits HARDER even though it's 5.25 inches. Subwoofer placement is key in getting really good sound out of it. Also, the subwoofer definitely has a break-in period of 20 or so hours in my experience. So, I currently have the first sound bar I bought back in September connected to the new subwoofer and the new soundbar can go where ever needs on in the house. Changing my review to 5 stars as its a great soundbar especially for the price. A lot of other companies are selling very similar specs with 2x and 3x the price.The sound bar itself can get VERY LOUD, however the subwoofer rattles at mid to high volume. I have had this issue out of the box. The sub sounds great for only 5inches and if placed correctly you can sometimes feel it in your chest and whatever you're sitting on. With the remote, the subwoofer has 10 levels and 25 on the soundbar. When watching movies to moderate to slightly high volume (level 18-25 on soundbar and level 7-10 on sub), the subwoofer just outputs this rattling noise from the driver. I'm not sure If I received a dud subwoofer but is really does take me out of the listening experience and most times have had to lower the sub level to 3-5 depending on what is playing and it goes away. Furthermore, it has a audio boosting mode however the rattling is even more prevalent with it on. This kinda sucks because it's genuinely a great system overall. If subwoofer worked as it should this is will very easily receive 5 stars. Im not sure If I qualify for a replacement to just the subwoofer alone. Until then I'll try not to regret buying it :(.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered it with the subwoofer, and the subwoofer definitely booms. Set up is pretty simple, I'm still messing around with the Bluetooth trying to figure that out, but for now I've got it running through the optic cable and that works really well. I don't have it in a really big room but it puts out more than enough sound. I was even impressed with the packaging. Definitely a great bargain for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good customer service
reviews.reviewText: **Update: I recently received the 32" soundbar as a replacement. It is a great upgrade for my factory TV speaker. It sounds surprisingly good listening to music. I will be extremely happy if this lasts a lot longer than the last one. I may look into getting the subwoofer.*Update: It didn't even last a month. The sound would cut out for several seconds then come back on. I tried to restarting at and re-pairing it, But the problem persisted. The Bluetooth was connected. I'm not sure if I want too gamble on another one...If I can get 1-2 years or more out of this, it will be what I was looking for. It's easy to set up and the sound is ok. It has three presets on the remote that changed the tone a little bit. It paired easily with my fire stick and can use the remote for my fire stick to control the volume. Seems to be a decent value, it's better than my TV speaker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality at a great price
reviews.reviewText: We got a 42” tv for the bedroom recently and wanted to upgrade the sound without breaking the bank. This little soundbar sounds great and is a huge upgrade from the tv speakers. I highly recommend.A couple of things to know before you buy. Most of this is in response to other reviews I’ve read.-This is a soundbar. Not a wireless Bluetooth speaker. It can connect to your tv via Bluetooth, but it has to be plugged in to an electrical outlet to have power. If you’re looking for a wireless/ rechargeable speaker, this isn’t it.-I was able to merge it with my insignia/ amazon tv remote so that I can use just the tv remote to control the tv and soundbar. My tv did not have Sayin listed as an option, but I saw another review that said to use Meidong, and sure enough that worked!-I got the pulsing feedback sound that others have mentioned when I first hooked it up. It took me a few tries to find the setting, but eventually figured out how to change the TV sound output to PCM.Overall I think this is a very good product and an excellent value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the purchase
reviews.reviewText: Got this speaker plus sub. As a temporary fix. But once hooking it up and using it. I have changed my mind. It it very loud and clear and the bass hits hard. It's also small enough I can easily use it at my PC. And have the same great booming sound. This speaker will Definitely live at my PC. Only cuse I want a bigger surround set for my bigger room. Definitely worth it. Would buy a second time definitely..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Little Sound Bar For The Money!
reviews.reviewText: This is a really nice sound bar for the price. I got it for the TV in my bedroom. I didn't want to spend a ton of money for basically white noise while I go to sleep. But I am really impressed with this thing. It's affordable. It was really easy to set up. And the sound quality is great. In fact, I got a little scared one night because I kept hearing voices from the corner of my room. Turns out, it was the background conversations from the show I was watching in a surround-sound-like experience. It was cool. So if you want to pay very little but get a lot in return, check this little sound bar out!
Realza el sonido del televisor ideal para escuchar la música y ver películas
No funciona el audio óptico :/Fuera de eso supero mis expectativas.
Muy buenas funciones, conectividad, tamaño y potencia, sobre todo su precio

reviews.reviewTitle: Buen volumen, demasiados graves y le faltan un poco de agudos
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. La barra es de una calidad buena y el sonido por igual, los graves son muy profundos para solo ser una barra de sonido con dos altavoces de muy buena potencia para el tamaño reducido, un único defecto es el bass reflex se satura mucho de aire y suena aveces muy soplado pero es poco y lo solucione fácilmente con un poco de espuma pero que pase bien el aire por que se puede quemar el amplificador y las bocinas por esos 40 watts
Superó mis expectativas, suena muy bien para lo que cuesta.
